content: The word of the LORD that came to Zephaniah son of Cushi son of Gedaliah son of Amariah son of Hezekiah, in the days of King Josiah son of Amon of Judah.
I will utterly sweep away everything
I will sweep away humans and animals;
I will make the wicked stumble.
I will stretch out my hand against Judah,
and I will cut off from this place every remnant of Baal
those who bow down on the roofs
those who bow down and swear to the ,
those who have turned back from following the ,
The Great Day of the Lord
The great day of the  is near,
the sound of the day of the  is bitter,
That day will be a day of wrath,
a day of ruin and devastation,
a day of clouds and thick darkness,
